projects.name: Style Transfer
details: This is an implementation of a research paper.
Able to replicate results from the paper

projects.name: ERP
details: Engineered an adaptable ERP system aligned with the new education policy
Built support for seamless data transfer from the existing system.
Ensured resilience to accommodate 10k concurrent users, emphasizing system performance and scalability.
Developed comprehensive setup documentation guidelines, streamlining implementation and maintenance processes.
Led training sessions for the next batch, imparting knowledge on new joining developers.
Managed the project efficiently by generating issues and meticulously tracking progress, ensuring timely and successful completion.

archived.name: JAMT - Just Another Monitoring Tool
details: JAMT (read as JAM) is a log monitoring tool that combines the simplicity of a CLI tool with the convenience of a WebUI. This lightweight solution allows you to effortlessly monitor logs, providing valuable insights into your application's behavior. With minimal setup, you can start monitoring logs and gaining valuable insights without any hassle.
archived.highlight: easy plug and play log monitor
